flawed_nl_solution:
First find the length of the conclusion by tripling the length of the introduction: 450 words * 3 = <<450*3=1530>>1530 words
Then subtract the length of the introduction and conclusion from the total length to find the combined length of the body sections: 5000 words - 1530 words - 450 words = <<5000-1530-450=3020>>3020 words
Then divide the combined length of the body section by the number of body sections to find the length of each section: 3020 words / 4 sections = <<3020/4=755>>755 words/section
#### 755

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1350, not 1530. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
